scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of women gathered around a central figure, possibly the Virgin Mary, who is seated and holding a child. The figures are dressed in medieval attire, with head coverings. Behind them, a stylized cityscape with towers and buildings is visible, framed by an arched structure. The foreground features a raised platform or altar-like structure with arched openings. The overall composition suggests a religious or devotional scene, possibly the Adoration of the Magi or a similar narrative involving the Virgin and Child.
